CODIFIED ORDINANCES OF SPRINGBORO, OHIO

PART SIX - GENERAL OFFENSES CODE

CHAPTER 612 Liquor Control

612.01 DEFINITIONS.

612.02 SALES TO AND USE BY UNDERAGE PERSONS; SECURING PUBLIC ACCOMMODATIONS.

612.021 PURCHASE, CONSUMPTION OR POSSESSION BY MINOR; MISREPRESENTATION.

612.03 SALES TO INTOXICATED PERSONS.

612.04 LIQUOR CONSUMPTION IN MOTOR VEHICLE.

612.05 PERMIT REQUIRED.

612.06 LOW-ALCOHOL BEVERAGES: SALE TO AND PURCHASE BY UNDERAGE PERSONS PROHIBITED. (REPEALED)

612.07 OPEN CONTAINER PROHIBITED.

612.08 HOURS OF SALE OR CONSUMPTION.

612.09 SALE OR POSSESSION OF DILUTED LIQUOR OR REFILLED CONTAINERS.

612.10 ILLEGAL POSSESSION OF INTOXICATING LIQUOR.
